title: Why progressing through lower ranks is so hard.
body: It just sorta hit me but I believe the main reason is because the amount of people willing to improve and better themselves vs the opposite is so damn disproportional that progress for most is nearly stunted based on sheer luck by that point.

replies.body: It is not the amount of talent. It is mostly attitude and an ability to work well with others even in stressful situations. Believe it or not this is also true in many workplace situations, so having the right mindset will help you in more than just League.
